subject: AI & Agents
title: AI and Democracy: Bots in the Ballot Box
description: One-minute skill: AI and Democracy: Bots in the Ballot Box.

hook.text: An army of AI-generated social media accounts floods an election with disinformation. Voters can't tell what's real.

buildup.text: AI can generate persuasive political content, microtarget voters, and create fake grassroots movements.

discovery.text: Astroturfing with AI is cheap, scalable, and nearly undetectable with current platform moderation.

twist.text: The same tools could enhance democracy â€” summarizing legislation, fact-checking claims in real time.

climax.text: The outcome depends on whether AI serves informed citizens or manipulated ones.

punchline.text: Democracy requires informed consent. AI can give or take it.

quiz.question: How can AI threaten democratic processes?
options: By generating scalable disinformation and fake grassroots movements
